typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TableName as string,
		TotalCount as integer,
		TotalPages as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PimcorePages
PimcorePages derive(TableName = 'ExtraTest',
		TotalPages = round(divide(TotalCount, 5000), 0,1) ) ~> AddColumns
AddColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		TableName as string,
		TotalCount as integer,
		TotalPages as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	postSQLs:[' DELETE  \n FROM [dbo].[Pages] \n WHERE TableName IS NULL;'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		TableName,
		TotalCount,
		TotalPages
	)) ~> sinkPimcorePages
